title: curtiswyatt
author: curtiswyatt
content: I need gas fees for my usdt.  Will payback with usdt trc20.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: curtiswyatt on December 04, 2022, 09:59:37 PMI need gas fees for my usdt.  Will payback with usdt trc20.You can purchase TRON via DEX exchanges or similar (e.g. CoinPlaza) for TRON with other crypto in instant trades.Others will point out that you haven't offered any collateral to cover this loan.

comments.author: curtiswyatt
comments.body: Collateral for 5 bucks?  I can't move my usdt because I don't have any trx.  Otherwise I wouldn't be here asking for 5 bucks in tron.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: For usdt transfer you need about 1trx which is 10cent, for an exchange maybe 10trx.You don't need 5$ for that.

comments.author: curtiswyatt
comments.body: I need 26 trx to move the usdt.  Which costs about two dollars.  And I need another 26 to move it in halves to different addresses. So 4 dollars if you wanna be picky. And I'm paying back ten.

comments.author: DarkStar_
comments.body: Post your Tron address and I'll stake you the energy to move your USDT. This is assuming you've held some TRX before and have an activated account, as otherwise I don't think this will work.

comments.author: DarkStar_
comments.body: Quote from: curtiswyatt on December 05, 2022, 09:07:35 AMThanksTCp35JDVHAbeP6aoq3mtZStXkKdV8GTo24I delegated ~46k energy to you: https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/e17914ae7e6c4b046af91465e7dde2e21d7718239f0e59784be414720ff20f79A USDT send takes about 15k energy, so this should be enough for 3 transactions per day for 3 days (I will undelegate after 3 days). If you'd like to leave a tip, my address is TLwNKx9tghLt7RZpVpnWo7SBQx2sJrmpjm.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Why has this loan been moved to the "marketplace" section?What does the OP have to hide?

comments.author: DarkStar_
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on December 06, 2022, 12:24:11 PMWhy has this loan been moved to the "marketplace" section?What does the OP have to hide?Mods are pretty consistent about moving altcoin only loan requests to the Marketplace (Altcoins) section. OP isn't trying to hide anything that way  Anyway, I've unstaked the energy I delegated to OP. It doesn't seem like they tried to move their USDT at all, so I guess their goal was to steal $5 worth of TRX. I didn't do my research properly when offering to stake them energy either - their account is owned by TQFymRj6AD57iFzpCrtHijBXXn5QdQsxAU, which is owned by TGsy6W3T4fs3nAMk4E6ohfXXsosbHXRLvK and has a balance of ~$30 worth of TRX. I'm surprised they even bothered putting 1000 USDT in their address in the first place.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: DarkStar_ on December 10, 2022, 02:58:48 AMMods are pretty consistent about moving altcoin only loan requests to the Marketplace (Altcoins) section. OP isn't trying to hide anything that way  I hadn't realised that was a thing.QuoteAnyway, I've unstaked the energy I delegated to OP. It doesn't seem like they tried to move their USDT at all, so I guess their goal was to steal $5 worth of TRX. I didn't do my research properly when offering to stake them energy either - their account is owned by TQFymRj6AD57iFzpCrtHijBXXn5QdQsxAU, which is owned by TGsy6W3T4fs3nAMk4E6ohfXXsosbHXRLvK and has a balance of ~$30 worth of TRX. I'm surprised they even bothered putting 1000 USDT in their address in the first place.At a guess a scammer isn't worried as to whether or not it's one cent or one million dollars, they just seem to do it because they can.
